see my latest post on www.pascalsview.com
American leaders must be stewards of our society, not just for this election cycle or the next one, but for future generations of Americans.
All but short-term thinking is absent from the behavior of the vast majority of our leaders.
Two important words should be at the forefront of any constructive discussions about America’s way forward: “posterity” and “stewardship.”
America’s debt downgrade is only the latest manifestation of our country’s slipping global competitiveness.
